Back:

Front: Create a ClusterRoleBinding named 'my-scheduler-as-kube-scheduler' that binds the ServiceAccount 'my-scheduler' to the ClusterRole 'system:kube-scheduler'
Back:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRoleBinding
metadata:
  name: my-scheduler-as-kube-scheduler
subjects:
  - kind: ServiceAccount
    name: my-scheduler
    namespace: kube-system
roleRef:
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: system:kube-scheduler
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io

Front: Create a ClusterRole that allows creating leases in coordination.k8s.io apiGroup
Back:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  name: system:kube-scheduler
rules:
  - apiGroups:
      - coordination.k8s.io
    resources:
      - leases
    verbs:
      - create
